General.Name: Blue Energy Ltd
General.Description: Blue Energy Limited, an oil and gas exploration company, engages in the exploration, evaluation, and development of conventional and unconventional oil and gas resources primarily in Queensland and the Northern Territory in Australia. The company holds 100% interest in ATP814P project covering 1,119 square kilometers located in Northern Bowen Basin; ATP1112A project covering 7,996 square kilometers located in Carpentaria Basin of North Western Queensland; and ATP813P project covering 2,055 square kilometers located in Galilee Basin in Central West Queensland. It also holds 100% interest in ATP1114A, ATP1117A, and ATP1123A projects covering 21,351 square kilometers located in Southern Georgina Basin Queensland; and ATP854P project covering 771 square kilometers located near Injune in central Queensland. In addition, the company holds 50% interest in EP199A, EP200, EP205A, EP206, EP207, EP208A, EP209A, EP210A, and EP211A projects covering 111,887 square kilometers located in the Wiso Basin of Central Northern Territory. Blue Energy Limited was incorporated in 1992 and is based in Brisbane, Australia.

0.Name: Mr. John Charles Ellice-Flint B.Sc., AMP
